申し訳ありません: (もうしわけありません) - I'm sorry/(it's) inexcusable; thank you very much (for help, etc.)
申し訳ございません: (もうしわけございません) - I'm sorry/(it's) inexcusable; thank you very much (for help, etc.)
申し訳ない: (もうしわけない) - I'm sorry/(it's) inexcusable/I feel regretful/I feel guilty; thank you very much (for help, etc.)
申し訳無い: (もうしわけない) - I'm sorry/(it's) inexcusable/I feel regretful/I feel guilty; thank you very much (for help, etc.)
申し越す: (もうしこす) - to send word to; to write to
申し込み: (moushikomi) - aplicativo, inscrição, solicitação, assinatura, oferta, proposta, aproximação, desafio
申し込み〆切: (もうしこみしめきり) - application deadline
申し込み書: (もうしこみしょ) - application form; written application
申し込み締切り: (もうしこみしめきり) - application deadline
申し込み順: (もうしこみじゅん) - order of applications; in order of application
申し込む: (もうしこむ) - to apply for; to make an application; to propose (marriage); to offer (mediation); to make an overture (of peace); to challenge; to lodge (objections); to request (an interview); to subscribe for; to book; to reserve
申し述べる: (もうしのべる) - to say; to tell (somebody); to state
申し送る: (もうしおくる) - to write to; to send word to; to hand over (official business)
申し遅れる: (もうしおくれる) - to be slow in saying
申し遣わす: (もうしつかわす) - to write to; to send word to; to hand over (official business)
申し開き: (もうしひらき) - an excuse; a defense; a defence
申し開らく: (もうしひらく) - to explain; to justify
申し難い: (もうしにくい) - I'm sorry to trouble you
申す: (もうす) - to say/to be called; (after a word beginning with お- or ご-) to do
申上げる: (もうしあげる) - to say/to tell/to state/to express/to offer/to extend (greetings, congratulations, etc.); to do
申付ける: (もうしつける) - to order; to instruct
申伝える: (もうしつたえる) - to convey a message (e.g. to one's superior); to communicate; to pass on; to pass; to pass along; to put across
申入: (もうしいれ) - proposal; offer; report; proposition; notice
申分のない: (もうしぶんのない) - no objection; nothing to criticize (criticise)
申分の無い: (もうしぶんのない) - no objection; nothing to criticize (criticise)
申合い: (もうしあい) - training between rikishi of equal strength
申告: (しんこく) - report; statement; filing a return; notification
申告制: (しんこくせい) - return system; tax payment by self-assessment; declaration system
申告漏れ: (しんこくもれ) - undeclared income; unreported earnings; unreported income
申告用紙: (しんこくようし) - (filling in) return form
申告納税: (しんこくのうぜい) - self-assessed tax payment
申命記: (しんめいき) - Deuteronomy (book of the Bible)
申年: (さるどし) - year of the monkey
申楽: (さるごう) - sarugaku (form of theatre popular in Japan during the 11th to 14th centuries); (さるがく only)  noh; (さるごう only) fooling around
申毒: (しんどく) - (former Chinese name for) India
申立: (もうしたて) - statement; account (of something); declaration; allegation
申立て: (もうしたて) - statement; account (of something); declaration; allegation
申込: (もうしこみ) - application; entry; request; subscription; offer; proposal; overture; challenge
申込み: (もうしこみ) - application; entry; request; subscription; offer; proposal; overture; challenge
申込み順: (もうしこみじゅん) - order of applications; in order of application
申込む: (もうしこむ) - to apply for; to make an application; to propose (marriage); to offer (mediation); to make an overture (of peace); to challenge; to lodge (objections); to request (an interview); to subscribe for; to book; to reserve
申込書: (もうしこみしょ) - application form; written application
申込締切: (もうしこみしめきり) - application deadline
申述べる: (もうしのべる) - to say; to tell (somebody); to state
申述をする: (しんじゅつをする) - to make a statement (before a court)
申達: (しんたつ) - notification (from a high to a low official)
男: (homem) - male , man, male; fellow, guy, chap, bloke; male lover, boyfriend, man; manliness, manly honor, manly honour, manly reputation
男が廃る: (おとこがすたる) - to hurt one's reputation; to be ashamed of oneself; to lose one's honour
男ことば: (おとこことば) - men's language; male language
男っ振り: (おとこっぷり) - public estimation; man's looks
男どうし: (おとこどうし) - male bonding; between men
男に二言はない: (おとこににごんはない) - a man's word is his bond; a man does not go back on what he's said
男のコ: (おとこのコ) - boy; male child; baby boy
男の中の男: (おとこのなかのおとこ) - man among men; manly man; alpha male
男の節句: (おとこのせっく) - Boy's Day celebration (May 5)
男は度胸女は愛敬: (おとこはどきょうおんなはあいきょう) - men should be brave, women should be affable
男ひでり: (おとこひでり) - scarcity of eligible men
男やもめ: (おとこやもめ) - widower; divorced man not remarried
男やもめにうじがわく: (おとこやもめにうじがわく) - Widowers are untidy; A man alone soon goes to seed; A man goes to pieces without a woman to look after him
男やもめに蛆がわく: (おとこやもめにうじがわく) - Widowers are untidy; A man alone soon goes to seed; A man goes to pieces without a woman to look after him
男一匹: (おとこいっぴき) - shining example of a man
男仮名: (おとこがな) - kanji (esp. used as phonetic symbols); man's handwriting
男任せ: (おとこまかせ) - leaving (something) up to one's man (e.g. husband, boyfriend, etc.)
男伊達: (おとこだて) - chivalrous man who helps the weak and fights the strong/knight in shining armor; ruffians who act under the pretence of being chivalrous
男兄弟: (おとこきょうだい) - brothers; bros
男冥利: (おとこみょうり) - the good fortune to have been born male
男出入り: (おとこでいり) - woman with a turbulent love life; woman always having man trouble
男勝り: (おとこまさり) - (of a woman) strong-minded; spirited; mannish
男友達: (おとこともだち) - boyfriend; man friend
男同士: (おとこどうし) - male bonding; between men
男名: (おとこな) - male name; adult name
